screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone. The top bar displays the current date (Sunday, Nov 27), temperature (47°F), and moon phase, with status icons such as battery, Wi-Fi, and signal. The bottom section has app icons for Google Photos, Messages, Gmail, Chrome, and YouTube, with a Google search bar at the bottom. The overall theme appears to have a soft pink gradient background.

Since the Walmart app is not currently visible on the home screen, the next step will be to either search for it or navigate to it through an app drawer if available.

Search for 'usb-b' and add it to the cart.
action_desc: Search for the Walmart app by swiping up on the home screen.
